vulnerability.name: USN-4004-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4004-1 fixed a vulnerability in Berkeley DB. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that Berkeley DB incorrectly handled certain inputs.  An attacker could possibly use this issue to read sensitive information.

statements.status_notes: Berkeley DB could be made to expose sensitive information. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
